content: this design works mostly with doubles crochet and chains it s very easy to follow and can be made longer if desired i love wearing this piece over long sleeves bralettes and tanks sizing bust inches waist inches size a 28-32 23-26 size b 32-35 26-29 size c 35-38 29-32 size d 38-41 33-36 size e 41-44 36-39 size f 44-47 39-42 size g 47-50 42-45 size h 50-53 45-48 size i 53-56 48-51 size j 56-59 51-54 **supplies** * yarn knitpicks comfy worsted 400-750 yards you can use any similar weighted yarn a cotton or cotton blend works best * 4 5 mm crochet hook * tapestry needle for sewing in ends **key** chain- chain skip skip slip_stitch slip_stitch st s stitch or stitches double_crochet double_crochet * * - repeat
